title: All The Heroes Are Dead: Book One of the Fallen Primarchs Series
description: In a world where everyone manifests special powers, only the strongest rule.Orphaned Elijah Littlemore is on the verge of manifesting one of the eleven powers that will dictate the rest of his life. Manifest weakly, and he is destined to live a life of servitude and hardship. Manifest a strong power, and he could be destined to become nobility.Omni grew up in this world and now rebels against the system that keeps nobility in power and the weaker pressed down in chains. But rebelling against the nobility comes at a price - he is labeled a terrorist of the state and is hunted wherever he goes. Making short jumps back and forth in the time line, Omni and his band attempt to change the horrifying war of the future by destroying the government of today. But they are running out of time...If you love superhero, dystopian, and coming of age stories - you'll love All The Heroes Are Dead!
author: T.S. Brothers
